post:
GalaxyHostPlus is officially started on 2nd August 2014. It is legally owned and operated by Galaxy Digital Networks, Carlow, Ireland. Currently, we do provide cheap and premium affordable web hosting and game hosting packages. We use parallels Plesk as our web hosting panel, which enables you to have great support and easiness to use. Our game hosting panel is a customized one and it enables you to have the full control over your game server. All our web hosting packages are also powered and optimized by Cloudflare which enhances your service. The main thing which places us in front of others is related to our customer support. Our dedicated support team is available 24/7 to meet your needs anytime and anywhere. We also provide the live support chat. Using this feature, you can directly chat with our operators and can have an instant solution for your issue. Whether it's related to sales or technical, our support team is always with you for solving any kind of the issues related to our services. So, If you are looking for an affordable hosting solution with premium support, you are at the right place. Go ahead to [galaxyhostplus.com](https://galaxyhostplus.com) and grab the package and explore our unique world of hosting.
